title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the spaghetti according to package instructions.
While the pasta is cooking, fry the bacon in a pan until crisp.
In a bowl, beat the eggs and mix in the cheese.
Drain the spaghetti and immediately toss it with the bacon.
Remove the pan from heat and mix in the egg and cheese mixture quickly.
Season with black pepper and serve immediately.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate the chicken in yogurt and tikka masala powder for at least 2 hours.
Grill or pan-fry the marinated chicken until cooked through.
In a separate pan, sauté onions, garlic, and ginger until golden brown.
Add the tomato sauce and cook for a few minutes.
Stir in the grilled chicken and cream, and cook until the sauce thickens.
Garnish with coriander leaves and serve with rice or naan.

title: Pizza Margherita
summary: Mozzarella Cheese and Pizza Sauce on a classic pizza base.
instructions: Preheat the oven to 220°C (425°F).
Roll out the pizza dough on a floured surface to your desired thickness.
Spread the pizza sauce evenly over the dough.
Top with mozzarella cheese.
Season with salt and pepper, and drizzle with olive oil.
Bake in the oven for 12-15 minutes or until the crust is golden and the cheese is bubbling.
Remove from the oven and top with fresh basil leaves before serving.

title: Lampa Shank
summary: Chickpea Patty with Tomato, Cucumber, Feta, Red Onion, Mixed Greens, and Basil Aioli.
instructions: Cook the chickpea patty according to package instructions.
Arrange the mixed greens on a plate.
Top with tomato slices, cucumber slices, crumbled feta cheese, and red onion.
Place the cooked chickpea patty on top.
Drizzle with basil aioli and serve immediately.
